media:group.media:title: Let’s Talk - Dad/Daughter Q/A - Part 1
media:group.media:description: Join Dr. Ken Canfield and Dr. Michelle Watson Canfield as they begin a 5 part series on the importance of the dad/daughter relationship. This week Ken and Michelle will dig deeper into how dads can lead their daughters to "lament," using insights from Michelle's new book, Let’s Talk, Conversation Starters for Dads and Daughters. Tune in each week for insights about your relationship with your daughter from two people with experience and research to help you win with your daughter.
